document.full_text: the united states has stepped up direct talks with the afghan taliban for a political settlement of the 10-year-old war, the washington post reported on tuesday, a move that analysts said earlier was easier following the death of osama bin laden.
document.title: u.s. deepens engagement with afghan taliban to end war: report
lines_and_colors: the united states has stepped up direct talks with the afghan taliban for a political settlement of the 10-year-old war, the washington post reported on tuesday, a move that analysts said earlier was easier following the death of osama bin laden.
